info.title: Rexxgo API
info.description: API documentation for Auth and Wallet modules

post.summary: Check if an email already exists
Mark a single notification as read
Send push notification to a user

allow_notification.description: Enable or disable all app notifications

balance_changes_notification.description: Receive notifications for account balance changes

get.summary: Get login activities of authenticated user

post.description: Update borrower KYC details on Bridge. Supports partial updates.

get.description: Returns all saved debit/credit cards for the authenticated user

post.summary: Save card after Stripe setup intent
post.description: Saves a card to the authenticated borrower using a Stripe SetupIntent
Charges a saved card using Stripe and credits the user's wallet

delete.description: Detaches a saved card from Stripe and removes it from the user's account

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of transactions to return per page.

get.description: Returns list of saved external beneficiaries for authenticated user filtered by currency.

post.summary: Transfer funds to a US external bank account
Transfer USDC from Bridge Wallet to external crypto wallet
Transfer USDC from Between REX-GO users
Transfer USD from Between REX-GO users

get.description: Fetch exchange rates for a given base currency from the rates table.

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: Base currency code (e.g., USD, USDC, NGN). Defaults to USD.

404.description: No rates found for the given base currency
